# init(rawValue:)

**Initializer**

Creates an underline style with the specified raw value.

## Declaration

```swift
init(rawValue: Int)
```

## Initializers

- **init(_:)**: Creates a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSUnderlineStyle] from `Text.LineStyle`.
title: init(rawValue:)
